channel.title: The Wolverine [2013]
channel.description:
What do you think of the movie so far based on the trailer?
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Rh1LdTFkm7I http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uBy6adpbusc

item.title: The Wolverine [2013]
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

I was surprised that they are making this movie, especially after their last Wolverine-based movie. Even after watching the trailers I’m still a little lost on the story for this one, I’ve been an Xmen movie fan and I hope this one does well.

Read full topic

item.title: The Wolverine [2013]
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

Don’t really like it that much…but then again xmen overall has been a disappointment for me movie wise.

Read full topic

item.title: The Wolverine [2013]
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

[quote=“3lv3n snip3r, post:3, topic:523469”][quote author=Soulcist link=topic=642017.msg4324235#msg4324235 date=1372634009]
Hmm… I supposed it wouldn’t hurt to see the movie, to be honest when I first saw the trailer I was thinking, “not another movie based on him…” but I don’t think it’ll REALLY matter at this point. I would like to see the movie.
[/quote]
They are trying to make it go along with the comics but also adding in that ‘movie’ feeling just like every movie based on comics.[/quote]
Eh… that never works out much just like it never (almost but never seen a game as good as the movie) works out with making a game from the movie but we’ll see what happens.

Read full topic

item.title: The Wolverine [2013]
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

Soulcist:

Hmm… I supposed it wouldn’t hurt to see the movie, to be honest when I first saw the trailer I was thinking, “not another movie based on him…” but I don’t think it’ll REALLY matter at this point. I would like to see the movie.

They are trying to make it go along with the comics but also adding in that ‘movie’ feeling just like every movie based on comics.

Read full topic
